alert.note: Alert for Harris; Meriwether; Talbot; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 11:31AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Meriwether, southeastern Troup, northwestern Talbot and Harris Counties through NOON EDT... At 1131 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Jones Crossroads, or 7 miles northwest of Hamilton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Hamilton, Greenville, Manchester, Pine Mountain, Woodbury, Waverly Hall, Warm Springs, Pine Mountain-Callaway Gardens, Shiloh, F.d. Roosevelt State Park, Mountville, Cannonville, Baughville, Flint Hill, Odessadale, Stovall, Mountain Hill, Big Springs, and Pine Mountain Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
